title: The Wishing Maiden
description: It is said that the Wishing Maiden is locked away. It is said that the Wishing Maiden grants any and every wish that she hears.Jacquotte seeks nothing more than adventure...and the power-hungry dreamer, Prince Caietanus, is determined to have all he desires, no matter what the cost. It just so happens that their wants overlap.Caught up in the search for the legendary Wishing Maiden, Jacquotte and her cunning band set out on a journey in which they face the desperate, the jealous, and the greedy - both at the point of a sword, and in their own reflections.Note: Contains a romance between two women.
author: R.R.  Hood
